password_min_length: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala osachepera zilembo {0} zazitali
password_must_contain_uppercase: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala ndi zilembo zazikulu imodzi
password_must_contain_lowercase: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala ndi zilembo zochepa
password_must_contain_number: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala ndi nambala imodzi
create_account_subtitle: Lembani zambiri pansipa kuti mupange akaunti yanu
forgot_password_subtitle: Lowetsani imelo yanu ndipo tikutumizirani ulalo woti mukonzenso mawu achinsinsi.
forgot_password_subtitle_sent: Tatumiza ulalo wokhazikitsanso mawu achinsinsi ku imelo yanu. Chonde yang'anani bokosi lanu ndikutsata malangizowo.
password_reset_sent: Imelo yobwezeretsa mawu achinsinsi yatumizidwa bwino!
check_email_for_reset: Yang'anani imelo yanu kuti mukonzenso ulalo
join_thousands: Lowani nawo masauzande ambiri ogwiritsa ntchito omwe amalandira kale Bitcoin yaulere
hero_main_heading: Sinthani nthawi yanu yaulere kukhala Bitcoin yaulere
trusted_by_users: Odalirika ndi ogwiritsa ntchito oposa {0} padziko lonse lapansi.
how_it_works_heading: Yambani kupeza crypto yaulere mkati mwa mphindi!
choose_offer_desc: Sankhani kuchokera pazantchito zomwe zili patsamba la ndalama. Timalemba zotsatsa zabwino kwambiri kuchokera kumakampani omwe akufuna kutsatsa mapulogalamu awo, kafukufuku, ndi zinthu zawo.
complete_offer_desc: Zopereka zambiri ndizosavuta ndipo zapeza kale ndalama kwa anthu masauzande ambiri. Ambiri amapereka malipiro awo oyambirira mkati mwa mphindi zochepa.
get_paid_instantly_desc: Mukatsimikiziridwa, ndalama zomwe mumapeza zimawonjezedwa ku akaunti yanu nthawi yomweyo. Chotsani kudzera pa Bitcoin, LiteCoin, Doge kapena Dash.
real_earnings: Zopeza zenizeni kuchokera kwa anthu enieni
level_up_desc: Kwerani mindandanda. Tsegulani mphotho za crypto. Kuchokera ku Hodler kupita ku Cryptolord, mupeza ma spins, zolimbitsa thupi, ndi zina zambiri.
avg_cashout_month: Avg. ndalama kwa ogwiritsa ntchito atsopano mwezi uno.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kufufuta akaunti yanu mpaka kalekale? Izi sizingasinthidwe ndipo deta yanu yonse idzachotsedwa mpaka kalekale.
delete_account_warning: [Chenjezo:] Izi zidzafufutiratu deta yanu yonse kuphatikizapo mbiri yanu, zopindula, ndi mbiri yamalonda.
verification_code_sent: Khodi yotsimikizira yatumizidwa ku imelo yanu
verify_delete_account_description: Takutumizirani nambala yotsimikizira ya manambala 4 ku imelo yanu. Chonde lowetsani khodi ili m'munsiyi kuti mumalize kuchotsa akaunti.
verification_code_must_be_4_digits: Khodi yotsimikizira iyenera kukhala ndi manambala anayi enieni
offer_token_note: Osagawana chizindikiro ichi ndi aliyense. Thandizo silidzakufunsani konse.
resend_failed: Zalephera kutumizanso nambala yotsimikizira. Chonde yesaninso.
verification_required_message: Akaunti yanu iyenera kutsimikiziridwa musanalowe. Tikutumizirani khodi yotsimikizira ku imelo yanu.
password_requirements: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala ndi zilembo zosachepera 8
password_reset_successful: Kukhazikitsanso mawu achinsinsi bwino! Chonde lowani ndi mawu achinsinsi anu atsopano.
password_min_8_chars: Mawu achinsinsi ayenera kukhala osachepera zilembo 8
contact_us_description: Tikufuna kumva kuchokera kwa inu. Titumizireni uthenga ndipo tiyankha posachedwa.
name: Dzina
subject: Mutu
_user_info_section: Gawo la Chidziwitso cha Ogwiritsa Ntchito
user_info_description: Widget iyi imawonetsa zambiri za ogwiritsa ntchito kuchokera ku whoami API. Imagwira ntchito potsitsa, kuwongolera zolakwika, ndipo imatha kuphatikizidwa mosavuta pazenera lililonse.
compact_description: Padding pang'ono komanso kukongoletsa mwamakonda pazogwiritsa ntchito sidebar kapena kabati.
custom_description: Custom gradient maziko ofananira ndi mutu wa pulogalamu.
import_widget: Lowetsani UserInfoWidget patsamba lanu kapena pazenera.
add_widget: Onjezani widget pamtengo wanu wa widget ndi kasinthidwe komwe mukufuna.
customize_styling: Sinthani makongoletsedwe anu pogwiritsa ntchito zokongoletsa ndi ma padding.
handle_states: Widget imangogwira zokha kutsitsa, zolakwika, komanso zopanda kanthu.
level_rewards_subtitle: Kwezani mulingo momwe mumalandira ndikutsegula mphotho zatsopano.
level_rewards_points_description: 250 points to next level. Mumapeza mfundo imodzi pa Ndalama 10 zilizonse zomwe mumapeza.
reward_daily_spin_subtitle: 1 Spin Yaulere Yatsiku ndi Tsiku Patsiku
reward_ptc_discount_subtitle: Palibe kuchotsera pa zotsatsa za PTC.
level_progress_description: 250 points to next level. Mumapeza mfundo imodzi pa Ndalama 10 zilizonse zomwe mumapeza.
profile_2fa_description: Tazindikira kuti mukulowa mu chipangizo chosadziwika.
profile_username_note: Dzina lanu lolowera litha kusinthidwa kamodzi pamasiku 30 aliwonse.
profile_interest_description: Akaunti yanu ipeza chiwongola dzanja cha 5% mukakhala ndi ndalama zopitilira 35,000. Chiwongola dzanja chimaperekedwa sabata iliyonse.
security_contact_support: Lumikizanani ndi Thandizo Kuti Musinthe Imelo
security_enable_2fa_desc: Khodi idzatumizidwa ku imelo yanu nthawi iliyonse mukalowa ndi chipangizo chatsopano.
security_enable_pin_desc: Muyenera kuyika pin code ya manambala 4 potsimikizira zofunikira.
security_2fa_app_desc: Mapulogalamu otsimikizira zinthu ziwiri amawonjezera chitetezo ku akaunti yanu. Mukalowa pa chipangizo chatsopano muyenera kuyika nambala 6 yanthawi yovuta kwambiri.
2fa_unknown_device_subtitle: Tawona kuti mukulowa ndi chipangizo chosadziwika.
2fa_instruction: Chonde lowetsani nambala yachitetezo kuchokera ku pulogalamu yanu yotsimikizira.
2fa_support_text: Ngati mulibe code yanu yachitetezo, chonde
turnstile_token_missing: Chizindikiro chotsimikizira chitetezo chikusowa. Chonde yesaninso.
2fa_dialog_body_text: Pogwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu yotsimikizira ngati Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, kapena 1Password, sankhani nambala ya QR. Ikupanga manambala 6 kuti mulembe pansipa.
2fa_dialog_note_text: Ngati mukuvutika kugwiritsa ntchito nambala ya QR, sankhani cholembera pamanja pa pulogalamu yanu, ndikulowetsa dzina lanu lolowera ndi nambala yake:
setup_2fa_instructions: Khazikitsani kutsimikizika kwazinthu ziwiri kuti muteteze akaunti yanu
please_wait: Chonde dikirani pamene tikutsimikizira khodi yanu...
2fa_extra_security: Onjezani chitetezo china ku akaunti yanu
2fa_enabled_desc: Akaunti yanu ili yotetezedwa ndi njira ziwiri zotsimikizira. Muyenera kuyika khodi ya manambala anayi mukalowa mu chipangizo chatsopano.
2fa_disabled_desc: Yambitsani kutsimikizira kwa zinthu ziwiri kuti muwonjezere chitetezo china ku akaunti yanu. Muyenera kuyika khodi ya manambala anayi yomwe imakhudza nthawi mukalowa.
2fa_initial_desc: Yang'anani momwe muliri wotsimikizika wazinthu ziwiri kuti muwone ngati akaunti yanu ndi yotetezedwa ndi chitetezo china.
check_2fa_status_description: Yang'anani mawonekedwe anu a 2FA kuti muwone ngati akaunti yanu ndi yotetezedwa
disable_2fa_warning_message: Kuletsa kutsimikizika kwazinthu ziwiri kupangitsa akaunti yanu kukhala yotetezeka. Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kupitiriza?
disable_2fa_security_note: Akaunti yanu idzatetezedwa ndi mawu achinsinsi okha.
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Lowetsani khodi ya manambala anayi kuchokera ku pulogalamu yanu yotsimikizira kuti mumalize kulowa kwanu.
2fa_login_info: Tsegulani pulogalamu yanu yotsimikizira kuti mupeze khodi.
welcome_description:
Malizitsani phunziro lalifupili kuti mupeze bonasi yapadera yolandirira.

Zingotenga miniti yokha!
free_spins_description:
Tsiku lililonse kapena sabata mukalowa, akaunti yanu imapatsidwa 'Free Spins' tsiku lililonse komanso 'Mystery Boxes' sabata iliyonse.

Nambala yomwe mumalandira imadalira mulingo wa akaunti yanu.
daily_streak_description:
Tsiku lililonse mukalowa ndikupeza ndalama zochepa, mutha kuyitanitsa kuchuluka kwanu kwatsiku ndi tsiku.

Masiku otsatizana kwambiri mukamatengera mpikisano wanu, mphotho imakulirakulira!

Ma akaunti apamwamba amapezanso mphotho zazikulu.
ptc_ads_description:
Onani Malonda a PTC kuti muwonjezere zotsatsa zachangu, zazifupi kuti muwonjezere kuchuluka kwa Coin tsiku lililonse.

Malonda adzatsegulidwa mu tabu yatsopano, choncho onetsetsani kuti imakhala yotseguka mpaka chowerengera chatha!
missions_description:
Mupeza mazana a mishoni ndi zomwe mukufuna kumaliza mu gawo la 'Mishoni' patsambali.

Kumaliza mishoni ndi ma quotes ndi njira yabwino yopezera ndalama za bonasi.

Onani tsamba la Pezani â†’ 'Bonus Missions' kuti mumve zambiri.
offers_description:
Kumaliza zotsatsa ndi njira imodzi yabwino yopezera Ndalama pa GigaFaucet.

Zotsatsa zitha kupezeka pagawo la 'Pezani' patsamba.

Pali mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya zotsatsa zomwe zilipo. Onetsetsani kuti mwawayang'ana omwe amakuchitirani bwino.
xp_description:
Nthawi zonse mukamaliza kutsatsa, kusewera zochulukitsira, kapena kuwonera kanema, ndi zina zambiri, mudzalandira XP (Zomwe Zachitika).

Kupeza XP kudzakulitsa akaunti yanu, kukutsegulani zina zambiri ndi mphotho zazikulu.

Mutha kupeza mulingo wa akaunti yanu patsamba lanu la Mbiri kapena Bonasi.
withdraw_description:
Mutha kubweza Ndalama zanu mukangogunda ndalama zosachepera 30,000.

Kuti mutuluke, pitani ku Akaunti â†’ 'Cash Out' ndikusankha njira yochotsera yomwe mukufuna.

Tsatirani malangizowa kuti mumalize kuchotsa.
all_set_description:
Tsopano mwakonzeka kuyamba kupeza Ndalama pa GigaFaucet!

Kumbukirani kuyang'ananso tsiku ndi tsiku kuti muwone ma spins anu a bonasi ndi mabokosi achinsinsi, komanso zopereka ndi mishoni kuti mukulitse zomwe mumapeza.

Zabwino zonse ndi kusangalala!
tutorial_reward_desc: Funsani 3 Bonasi Spins ndi 2 Mystery Box
referrals_manage_desc: Gawani GigaFaucet ndi anzanu & abale kuti mupeze ndalama zokwana 25% pakatumizidwa kulikonse.
referrals_manage_help: Ngati muli ndi mafunso aliwonse, chonde pitani patsamba lathu la Thandizo.
referrals_link_desc: Gawani ulalo wanu pama media ochezera, mabulogu, kapena mawebusayiti a PTC ndi zina. Ogwiritsa ntchito omwe amalembetsa ulalo wanu adzalandira ndalama!
referrals_details_desc: Mpikisano wotumizira anthu amachitika mwezi uliwonse ndipo amalipidwa kumapeto kwa mwezi uliwonse. Pezani zolowa za aliyense wotumizidwa.
referrals_users_desc: Onani ogwiritsa ntchito omwe mwawatchula ku GigaFaucet
referral_get_started_desc: Ingotumizani ogwiritsa ntchito ku GigaFaucet pogwiritsa ntchito ulalo wanu wotumizira. Adzawatsata okha ndikunenedwa kuti ndi inu ngati alembetsa nthawi iliyonse mkati mwa masiku 30.
referral_point_1: Mupeza 25% yazomwe mungatumizire zomwe mwatumiza KWA MOYO.
referral_point_2: Mupezanso 10% mwazomwe mwatumizazo zimapeza phindu la khoma.
referral_point_3: Palibe malire pa kuchuluka kwa omwe mungatumize.
referral_point_4: Kutumiza pachida chimodzi kapena m'nyumba imodzi sikuloledwa ndipo sikudzawerengedwa ngati kutumiza.
referral_warning: CHOFUNIKA: Mauthenga osavomerezeka, abodza kapena obwerezabwereza sadzawerengedwa. Akaunti yanu ikhoza kuthetsedwa ndipo ndalama zonse za ndalama zitha kutayidwa ngati mutapezeka kuti mukutumiza mauthenga osavomerezeka.
referral_banner_note: Dinani kuti mukopere kachidindo ndikugwiritsa ntchito zikwangwani izi patsamba lanu kapena bulogu yanu kuti mukope anthu omwe angatumizidwe.
referral_get_started_warning: ZOFUNIKA: Kutumiza kosavomerezeka, kwabodza kapena kubwereza sikuwerengedwa. Akaunti yanu ikhoza kuthetsedwa ndipo Ndalama zonse zidzachotsedwa ngati mutapezeka kuti mukutumiza zosayenera. Tili ndi njira zodziwikiratu kuti tizindikire ndikuletsa kutumiza kosayenera. Mwachenjezedwa.
join_crypto_event_description_widget_tex:
Pezani, sewera, ndi kusonkhanitsa mphotho tsiku lililonse kudzera muzochitika zapadera, mabonasi amndandanda,
ndi mpikisano wamagulu.
event_earn_coins_continue_streak: Pezani Ndalama Kuti Mupitilize Mzere Wanu
event_daily_streak_resets: Mipikisano yatsiku ndi tsiku imayambiranso pakadutsa maola {0}
event_invite_friends_win_coins: Itanani anzanu ndikupambana ndalama kwa moyo wanu wonse!
change_your_country_description: Sankhani dziko lomwe mukukhala. Zopereka zomwe zikupezeka zidzadalira dziko lino.
change_your_language_note: Kusintha chinenero chanu kudzasintha mawonekedwe onse a pulogalamuyi.
offer_token_description: Ndi ID yanu yopereka, yomwe mungagwiritse ntchito kulumikizana ndi Offerwall kuthana ndi zovuta zanu.
upload_new_avatar_desc: Chithunzichi chikuyenera kukhala chamtundu wa PNG kapena JPEG ndipo sichiyenera kupitirira 1MB kukula kwake
reward_description_prefix: Kwezani mulingo momwe mumalandira ndikutsegula mphotho zatsopano. Mumapeza 1XP point pa chilichonse
change_your_email_description: Mudzalandira khodi kudzera pa imelo kuti mutsimikizire imelo yanu yatsopano.
change_your_email_success: Imelo yanu yasinthidwa bwino. Khodi yotsimikizira yatumizidwa ku imelo yanu yatsopano.
new_email_same_as_current: Imelo yatsopano iyenera kukhala yosiyana ndi imelo yomwe ilipo
change_your_country_note: Mutha kusintha dziko lanu katatu pachaka.
setup_2fa_app_description: Gwiritsani ntchito pulogalamu yotsimikizira ngati [Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy,] kapena [1Password]. Skani khodi ya QR pansipa. Idzakupatsani khodi ya manambala anayi kuti muyike pansipa.
setup_2fa_app_note: Ngati mukuvutika kusanthula kachidindo ka QR, sankhani cholembera pamanja mu pulogalamu yanu yotsimikizira ndikulowetsa dzina lanu lolowera ndi nambala iyi:
name_unchanged: Dzina latsopano ndilofanana ndi dzina lanu
change_password_description: Mutha kusintha chinsinsi cha akaunti yanu.
repeat_password_required: Chonde bwerezani mawu achinsinsi anu atsopano

password_changed_successfully: Mawu achinsinsi adasinthidwa bwino. Chonde lowaninso ndi mawu achinsinsi anu atsopano.
failed_to_change_password: Zalephera kusintha mawu achinsinsi. Chonde yesaninso.
twofa_description: Mapulogalamu otsimikizira zinthu ziwiri amawonjezera chitetezo china ku akaunti yanu. Mukalowa mu chipangizo chatsopano, muyenera kuyika khodi ya manambala anayi yomwe imayang'ana nthawi.

enable_security_pin_note: Gwiritsani ntchito PIN yanu yokhala ndi manambala 4 kuti mutsimikize zochita zofunika kwambiri muakaunti.
notifications_description: Yambitsani zidziwitso kuti mulandire zidziwitso pazinthu zofunika
show_stats_description: Mukayatsa, ziwerengero za akaunti yanu zimawonetsedwa pa mbiri yanu. Zimayatsa mwachisawawa.
anonymous_contests_description: Mukayatsidwa, akaunti yanu imawonekera mosadziwika pampikisano. Kuzimitsa mwachisawawa.
delete_account_description: Kuchotsa akaunti yanu ndikokhazikika. Mphotho zanu, ndalama zanu ndi zotumizira zidzatayika kwamuyaya.
country_not_changed_error: Dziko losankhidwa ndilofanana ndi dziko lanu

come_back_later_for_more: Bwereraninso pambuyo pake kuti mudzapeze zambiri!
